author: psmith
msg: Added basic Load Generator classes.  Tests on my Mac Book Pro using 500 threads can transmit
(and therefore the Service receives) 650 events/second.  The indexing subsystem could only
cope with 350 event/second, so the backlog obviously kept going up.  This is only with
out-of-the-box Lucene tuning, so I know there's plenty of room for improvement in indexing speed.
Web module _sloooowly_ moving along as I learn about Spring MVC.  Can now choose a Context
and perform a search, though no results are shown as yet.
